paragraph.heading: 1Indent and un indent selection
paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStudio editor offers the possibility to indent or unindent selected lines.

item.paragraph:
The "Indent" command corresponds to the Indent selectionentry in the Advanced submenu of the
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml
Edit
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml Menu . It may be called by using the keyboard shortcut "Tab" too. Its action is to insert a tabulation in front of each
../20_selection.xml selected line.

The "Unindent" command corresponds to the Unindent selection entry in the Advanced submenu of the
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml
Edit
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml Menu . It may be called by using the keyboard shortcut "Shift+Tab" too. Its action is to remove the tabulation in front of each
../20_selection.xml selected line if there is such acharacter.

paragraph.note: Note: If there is no selection, you may still use the unindent shortcut "Shift+Tab". The command will be applied to the current line.
